columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the availability set

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure

columns.name: proximity_placement_group_id
columns.description: Specifies information about the proximity placement group that the availability set should be assigned to

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: Specifies the number of virtual machines in the scale set

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set

columns.name: virtual_machines
columns.description: A list of references to all virtual machines in the availability set
